title: Linotype Frutiger or Frutiger Next?
content:
Hi,   
   
Just wondering what peoples thoughts are on these 2 versions, and which they think is better?   
   
I've compared them and the main difference seems to be that the weights of the Frutiger Next version are slightly lighter than the Frutiger version, as well as the addition of a medium weight, true italics and a different ampersand (looks the same as the univers ampersand).   
   
thanks   
iota.
author: iota

comments.content:
J-F once said Frutiger is still better than Frutiger Next.   
Check his posts (June 10) in [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103535/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/11541.html).
